params.ethAmount: The amount of collateral being deposited
params.termId: The term id for which the collateral is being deposited

params.ethAmount: The amount of collateral being withdrawn
params.termId: The term id for which the collateral is being withdrawn
params.user: The user who is withdrawing the collateral

depositYG(uint256,uint256).notice: This function is used to deposit collateral for yield generation

withdrawYG(uint256,address,uint256).notice: This function is used to withdraw collateral from yield generation
